Cheyenne.Cheyenne Regional Medical Center:
Cheyenne Regional Medical Center (CRMC) is a hospital located in Cheyenne, Wyoming, USA. CRMC is divided into three campuses.


== CRMC West Building ==
The West Building hosts acute-care services including a trauma center, inpatient and outpatient surgery, intensive care, physical therapy, obstetrics, neurology, cardiology, oncology, orthopedics, and endscopy.


== CRMC East Building ==
The East Building handles most of the outpatient services for the hospital, including a rehabilitation center and behavioral health services.
